Generation V.Black: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
Generation V.White: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
Generation V.Black 2: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.
Generation V.White 2: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.

Generation VI.X: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
Generation VI.Y: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

Generation VII.Sun: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
Generation VII.Moon: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Alola, where it's warm all year round, is a comfortable environment for this Pokémon. Sometimes you'll even see it outside of deserts.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Sandile's still not good at hunting, so it mostly eats things that have collapsed in the desert. It's called “the cleaner of the desert.”

Generation VIII.Sword: The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand and sleeps until sunrise.
Generation VIII.Shield: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it's swimming.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
Generation IX.Violet: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.

Generation V.Black 2: Route 4 , Desert Resort , Relic Castle Desert Resort ( N's Pokémon )
Generation V.White 2: Route 4 , Desert Resort , Relic Castle Desert Resort ( N's Pokémon )
